attributes.title: Shrek
attributes.review:
AWFUL JUST DARN AWFUL

I got this app to stay up to date to the new and when I opened the app it took a picture of me and then the app crashed then completely shut down and you just hear trump say thank you for your help!?!?? LIKE WHAT! and now they keep that picture I’m their system with no way of getting it back!?!?!!!?!

attributes.title: it’s not very good
attributes.review:
i wanted to download this app because donald trump always intrigued me but once i downloaded it and opened it IT HAD HIS FACE ALL OVER THE APP. i was hoping to get away with just simply seeing the info but that orange bald weird looking president was there! what do i do i love his policies but i’m not in love with his face... love y’all and remember to keep an eye out for seleenerrr 
-👄👁

Absolutely disgusting 🤮🤮, the colors and font are a fashion disaster. ✨✨ i mean, who uses R E D, W H I T E, and B L U E next to a neon cheeto!! 😡😡😡 Woah there- trump 😳 why are we going so fast 💨 💨. I just got in and you ask for my mobile phone number 📱?? I didn’t know you liked me like that teehee 😳✨. Next time please use some facts and don’t go this fast 💨 . No one likes a gold 🏆 digging bunker boy! 💀💀🧑🧑

attributes.title: This app needs impeached
attributes.review: I download this app in hopes it would make my phone great again but I was covfefe... My great dictator of the unfree world has disappointed me once again. Also it causes side effects such as casual racism, sexism and Islamophobia. Also now am having an urge to file bankruptcy and start another failed casino. Weird app.

attributes.title: Terrible!!
attributes.review: I honestly downloaded this app to support my president, but when I opened it up, it just crashed!! It also made my phone create a high pitches noise that played very loudly, and it terrified my kids. There were listening to Kidz Bop, and they still heard it!! Absolutely terrible; I do not recommend. Get this off the App Store!!

attributes.title: Disgusting horrible man!!!
attributes.review: I don’t know what to say to this anymore. I mean, I feel like we’ve been saying everything that needs to be said for the longest time but he’s not listening. We need him to stop his reign of terror so we can actually enjoy 2020. All I’m saying is this man needs to be stopped before more people get hurt.

attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: It caused my phone to glitch out as soon as I opened it! I didn’t know downloading it would automatically sign me up for a cult that I don’t want to be a part of. Also, the information on it is absurd! i’ve never been fed such propaganda and biased content and I can’t believe this is considered “news”.

attributes.title: Waste!
attributes.review: The quality on this app is low. The loading in general takes forever, even on different devices. The app contains false information and contradicts everything he says in person, plus the news. There was no point in buying this app!

attributes.title: Dont get it twisted, this is a 0/5 review
attributes.review: So unfortunate the passing of our cheeto, toupee wearing president. This campaign is an insult to his dying memory, quotes like ‘grab em by the p***y’ ‘if we inject alcohol into out system, it will fight off the virus’ and his ventures into his bunker, use of ‘chinese virus’ as an actual term. But i digress, we should all respect and pay tribute to the man who put children in cages 💕💕💕👁👅👁🧚🧚🧚🧚‍♂️🧚🧚‍♂️💗💓💞💖💖

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is horrible.😡I can’t believe this, this is outrageous!!! When using this app it began glitching, and the glitches kept saying false information on how trump was going to supposedly “keep america great”!! I believe this use of false information is absolutely disgusting and I hope that this app is reviewed and taken down!!!😡
